Articles.Content:
This is my first plane so kinda new at this but here you go.

From what ive tried with the plane it will fly up to 12k and fall till it gets to 9k-10 and wabble between that area. It does have a bit of a right pull idk why but some simple inflight management and trim should fix that.

Fastest ive gotten it to go was around 600m/s

Warning here: as the plane uses fuel it will go faster and higher so you can let it do its own thing it will fly nicely just dont forget the rolling

It can fly for 417,000m,but you can glide another 20,000 or so if done properly.

Edited September 23, 2012 by moxzot
